name: The Final One
description:
The Final One is the Horror/Shooting game, the story about the abandon doll museum that has been brought by Wilhelm Gefahrwelz the millionaire.

But something happen to that place.
If someone enter to that place no one come back alive.

So the he decide to hire the private investigator to investigate that place. That is Vivian Walterson the girl who is adopt by police man and she became the investigator.

This game is inspire by survival horror games like Cry of fear and Outlast.

You never know what is coming.

System Requirements
MINIMUM:
OS: 32-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8 & Windows 8.1)
Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 2 GB available space
Sound Card: DX11 compatible

RECOMMENDED:
OS: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8 & Windows 8.1 or above)
Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 or higher with 4GB of RAM
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 2 GB available space
Sound Card: DX11 compatible
